welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Little Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city known for its beautiful lakes, friendly community, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Little Canada has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
